generalMsg: The enemy attacks are continuing, and they are getting faster. We have to protect our camp! We used to have shields for situations like these, but they haven't been activated in such a long time... You know how these things work, try activating them!

soldierMsg.1: Remember, shields are objects, so you have to create them before adding them to the shields array!
soldierMsg.2:
The positions of the shields can be found in the shieldPos array: var shieldPos =
[{x: 145, y:420}, // First shield
{x: 365, y:420}]; // second shield
